sentences.english: Medication was given to antidote the poison the young girl had swallowed.
sentences.chinese: 那个吞下毒物的少女已服用了解毒药。

sentences.english: International Journal of Toxicology, Occupational and Environmental Health.
sentences.chinese: 国际毒物学，职业与环境卫生杂志。

sentences.english: It is designed to filter out viruses and toxins before they attack organs.
sentences.chinese: 在病毒和毒物攻击器官时血液纯化仪就滤出病毒。

sentences.english: Toxicologists are intrigued, but say further evidence is needed.
sentences.chinese: 毒物学者也加入了研究，但他们要求更有力的证据。

sentences.english: In fact, his friends are calling for his body to be exhumed and tested by toxicologists !
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他的朋友现正要求毒物专家来开棺验尸。

sentences.english: The toxin can make sea life sick.
sentences.chinese: 该种毒物能使海洋生物病变。

sentences.english: So, what did your toxicologist say?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你的毒物学专家是怎么说的？

sentences.english: If people eat natural poisons, they must go to the hospital right away to have their stomachs emptied.
sentences.chinese: 如果人们信用了天然毒物，他们必须马上去医院洗胃。

sentences.english: This is the website of the National Center for Toxicological Research (NCTR).
sentences.chinese: 这是国立毒物学研究中心的网站。

sentences.english: Well burning the garbage releases the toxics up into the air.
sentences.chinese: 焚烧垃圾会释放毒物到空气中。

sentences.english: Light can cause potatoes to develop a poison called solanine .
sentences.chinese: 因为光线会导致马铃薯生出一种叫做茄碱的毒物。

sentences.english: Certain pharmaceuticals or chemical poison can cause iron bead young cell is anaemic.
sentences.chinese: 某些药物或化学毒物可引起铁粒幼细胞贫血。

sentences.english: Toxicologist Spiller is director of the Kentucky Regional Poison Center.
sentences.chinese: 毒物学家史必乐是肯塔基地区毒物中心主任。

sentences.english: Toxicologist Spiller is director of the Kentucky Regional Poison Center.
sentences.chinese: 毒物学家史必乐是肯塔基地区毒物中心主任。

sentences.english: How about the victims’ feature if the poison has some potential damage to their body?
sentences.chinese: 如果这种毒物对人体具有潜在的损害，那又怎么办呢？

sentences.english: This form venerates Avalokitesvara who protects sentient beings from harm by all snakes, scorpions and their venom.
sentences.chinese: 此菩萨化身颂扬观音保护众生不受毒物伤害之法力。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
